The claim is based on estimates made by: Joint Committee on Taxation, a reliable and independent source.
Analyses done by two expert nonprofit or: the Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget and the Tax Policy Center, support the claim.
The: 600 billion in tax breaks is the projected value over a 10-year period (2017 through 2026) of repealing taxes contained in Obamacare and making other tax changes.
The tax breaks primarily benefit high: income earners and businesses, with a significant portion going to the top 1 percent of earners.
